title: Scaredy Crow
description: Two crows decide to rest for the night in the cornfield. Students learn about cause-and-effect relationships from the crows' reactions when the scarecrow begins to move. The text features supporting illustrations and character dialogue.
meta: blowing, corn, farmer, moved, night, scare, scarecrow, tractor, wind
Cause and Effect : Identify cause and effect
Segment Onset and Rime : Segment onset and rime
Quotation Marks : Recognize quotation marks at the beginning and end of dialogue
Content Vocabulary : Understand and use content vocabulary

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
